title: Katharine McPhee Foster is a bohemian vision in an ethnic-print dress
text:
They said their vows in front of a crowd back in June.

And Katharine McPhee Foster and David Foster appeared before the masses again as they performed together at Indonesia's Batik Music Festival on Tuesday.

Katharine, 35, donned an asymmetrical wrap dress in an ethnic print with a maxi silhouette.

Live: Katharine McPhee Foster and David Foster got in front of the masses again as they performed together at Indonesia's Batik Music Festival on Tuesday

She wore her long brunette locks with beachy waves and allowed them to cascade down her back.

The American Idol alumna accessorized with a single gold band around her neck.

She posted a photo of her outfit to Instagram, captioning it: 'A little late on this but THANK YOU INDONESIA! It was a total honor to perform along side some amazing talent at the @batikmusicfestival and be so immersed in your culture.'

Gorgeous: Katharine, 35, donned an asymmetrical wrap dress in an ethnic print with a maxi silhouette

Katharine and David performed the songs To Love You More, Over the Rainbow and That's Life among others while onstage.

The two were wed in a lavish ceremony in London at the Church of Saint Yeghiche in South Kensington on June 28.

Katharine wore a gown by Zac Posen and David wore a tuxedo by Stefano Ricci.

Belt it out! Katharine and David performed the songs To Love You More, Over the Rainbow and That's Life among others while onstage

Around 150 guests were in attendance including close family and friends.

It was the second marriage for Katharine and the fifth marriage for David.

David was previously wed to Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Yolanda Hadid following ex-wives B.J. Cook, Rebecca Dyer and Linda Thompson.
description: They said their vows in front of a crowd back in June. And Katharine McPhee Foster and David Foster got in front of the masses again as they performed together at Indonesia's Batik
